page.metadesc: Gastronomic tavern in the eixample district of Barcelona, cooking traditional dishes with a creative twist. Also available to take away and delivery.

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.text: El Tiet also makes a daily lunch formula during week days, including bread drink and desert, at 11,50.
menu.call-text-alt: Call us to know today's menu
menu.ig-text-alt: Check today's menu on El Tiet Taver Teca's Instagram

bravas.name: Bravas "El Tiet"
bravas.desc: Patatas bravas, cut in dice served with our sauces.

salad.name: Russian Salad
salad.desc: potatos, hard boiled eggs, tuna belly, olives, "pimiento del piquillo" peppers, mayonnaise and picos (bread).

hummus.name: Hummus and papadum
hummus.desc: A papadum is a kind of galette maid from chickpea farina.

anchoa.name: Cantabric anchovy with pan con tomate

jamon.name: Iberic Ham with pan con tomate
jamon.desc: 50 gr. iberic Ham with pan con tomate (tomato bread).

burrata.name: Burrata with dry tomato oil, iberic ham and dry fruits

sardina.name: Smocked sardines coca
sardina.desc: On toasted pan de coca (flat bread), onion and fennel sauté, rucula and cherry tomatoes.

pollo.name: Chicken strips with homemade BBQ sauce
pollo.desc: Chicken strips a la andalusa, breaded with kiko powder, and our barbecue sauce.

huemium.name: Premium Egg Parmentier
huemium.desc: With Iberic Ham and truffle oil.

huefoie.name: Egg Parmentier foie
huefoie.desc: With fresh foie gras a la plancha.

tartare.name: Tartare Steak
tartare.desc: 100gr. hand minced raw beef meat, served with small toasts and potato chips.

foie.name: Foie poele
foie.desc: Fresh foie gras a la plancha, candied fruits and gingerbread.

rubia.name: Rubia Gallega beef
rubia.desc: 200 gr. Rubia Gallega beef (Galician blond) matured 37 days, grill cooked. With  Parmentier and stir-fried button mushrooms.

trubia.name: Rubia Gallega Tartare Steak
trubia.desc: 150gr. hand minced raw Rubia Gallega beef (Galician blond), served with small toasts and potato chips.

pibil.name: Cochinita Pibil
pibil.desc: Marinated and slow cooked suckling pig meat, with red onion, coriander and lime. Served with “tatomada” sauce (grilled vegetables) and crispy pita bread.

tallarines.name: Calamar Tallarines
tallarines.desc: Calamar strips stir fired with garlic and chived , served with a fried egg.

pulpo.name: Grilled Octopussy
pulpo.desc: 100 gr. Grilled Octopussy with celeri cream and cassis caramel.

bacalao.name: Cod confit
bacalao.desc: nsalted Cod "Taco" confit, with potatoe cream and sobrasada oil. Can be changed for dry fruits oil.

rodaballo.name: "Fricandó" de turbot
rodaballo.desc: Turbot fricassee with potatoes, "moixernons" (mushroom) and catalan picada (minced vegetables).

story.title: Discover El Tiet
story.text:
El Tiet sale de la mente de Ivan, nuestro chef (pero chhh, que no le gusta que le llamemos chef).

Un lugar con el espiritu convivial, caloroso y desenfadado de una taverna, donde se puede disfrutar y descubrir platos y tapas tradicionales con un toque creativo, refinado, gastronomico, y sobre todo siempre hecho con cariño !

Solo o bien acompañado, sean lo que sean tus ganas del momento : tomar una caña con bravas, una fideua, un cochinillo o te sientes atravecido probar un pulpo con mermelada,sea tapas o plato, tradicional o creativo, comillon o pica pica, carne, pescado o verduras, el Tiet taver teca te da la bienvenida y de servira lo que pides,siempre hecho con cariño y gran respeto a los ingredientes, la gastronomia y a los amantes de buena comida.
